thread.title: Anthony and Louise Pecoraro, Florida
thread.title_full: Gullwing Motor reviewed by Anthony and Louise Pecoraro, Florida

author: Anthony and Louise Pecoraro, Florida
title: Anthony and Louise Pecoraro, Florida
text: Was a pleasure to sell our car to Peter Kumar of Gullwing. He was very fair to us, and we feel that we got a great deal. Debbie from his staff made the paperwork painless, and Oleg from VIP Xport loaded our car very efficiently. Highly recommend this organization.
